reviews.text: i am no expert in kolsch, and this is my first bottle.  therefore, itâs like, a-ha, so this is kolsch.  itâs decent.

Appealing color and less carbonated Ale, which could be clearly distinguished when pouring. Well balanced toffee, nutty and creamy when sniffing. Rich malty flavour goes well with hint of floral hop when in the throat. A perfect deer drink in colder days.
